overview: Radzi, Rudy and Tuan Haji Kassim fall in love with three different women. Due to the troubles and obstacles that occur, the trio fails to succeed in each of their love life. They try everything that they can to get the attention of their partners but they still fail miserably. The trio then decides to resort to something that they shouldn`t have done which leads to them committing unwanted crimes.
title: Radhi Rudy Bin Dadu
